main event: On 20 September 1958, at Andrews AFB in Washington DC, military personnel reported a UFO sighting that led to the dispatch of a T-33 and a helicopter to check on a UFO landing. The UFO was found to be color-coded trucks doing what appeared to be world-wide tension work, causing initial tension but lessening following observations.
interesting points: The length of observation was over 1 hour.
The UFO sighting involved military personnel and was also reported in a newspaper article from The Washington Post.
A thorough written description of a UFO sighting was provided, describing the object as round, about half again as large as the moon, with a glowing orange color, and sparks shooting to the rear.
The Air Force investigation ultimately identified the reported UFO as a conventional military aircraft engaged in stationary activities.
The sighting occurred during a time when Mars was drawing near to Earth, leading to an impressive celestial display of the red planet in the September sky.
